## LHC con resguardo

```{r paqueterias, include = F, echo = F}
library(RColorBrewer)
library(xts)
library(dygraphs)
```

```{r datos, echo = F}
# Limpieza de datos
LHC = read.csv("../Datos/Tidy/LHC.csv")
ID = LHC[, 1:5]
LHC = t(LHC[, -(1:5)])
colnames(LHC) = ID$MARCA
LHC = xts(LHC,
          order.by = seq.Date(from = as.Date("2015-01-200"),
                              by = "months", length.out = 6)
          )
```

<div id="graphdiv">
```{r LHC CR, echo = F}
dygraph(data = LHC[, ID$Resguardo == "CR"], width = 700, height = 400,
        main = "LHC", xlab = paste("Tina:", 1), group = "LHC") %>%
        dyHighlight(highlightSeriesOpts = list(strokeWidth = 3)) %>% 
        dyLegend(labelsSeparateLines = T, labelsDiv = "LHCCR") %>% 
        dyAxis("x", rangePad = 20) %>%
        dyOptions(drawPoints = T, pointSize = 2)
```
</div>

<div id="LHCCR", class="legend">
</div>

## LHC sin resguardo
<div id="graphdiv">
```{r LHC SR, echo = F}
dygraph(data = LHC[, ID$Resguardo == "SR"], width = 700, height = 400,
        main = "LHC", xlab = paste("Tina:", 2), group = "LHC") %>%
        dyHighlight(highlightSeriesOpts = list(strokeWidth = 3)) %>% 
        dyLegend(width = 500, labelsDiv = "LHCSR", labelsSeparateLines = T) %>% 
        dyAxis("x", rangePad = 20) %>%
        dyOptions(drawPoints = T, pointSize = 2)
```
</div>

<div id="LHCSR", class="legend">
</div>
